single-action: `TYPE` 'tiktok.com' in the address bar and `PRESS` Enter
`SCROLL` through results and `CLICK` one video to play
`CLICK` the Extensions icon in the Chrome toolbar
`PRESS` Ctrl+S in the extension interface if a save option is shown
`VERIFY` that the saved file or metadata exists
grouped-action: `INTERACT` with the plugin interface to analyze the video
